EmailTemplate.name: SW: SW unable to attend; talk to staffing rep
EmailTemplate.subject: SW: SW unable to attend; talk to staffing rep
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
{!Contact.Name}'s SW is no longer able to attend the PIE. Please contact {!Contact.Name} to let them know and to arrange an alternative meeting.
Click on the link to view the record {!Contact.Link}
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever the SW dropped out of the PIE but the YPPG is still due to attend.
